Text:
http://gameinfocenter.com/pc-games/system-requirements/F1-2012.html

Minimum system requirements

* OS: Windows XP , Vista or Windows 7
* CPU: Intel Core 2 Duo @ 2.4Ghz or AMD Athlon X2 5400+
* RAM: 2 GB
* HDD: 15 GB free disk space
* Graphics: AMD HD2600 or NVIDIA Geforce 8600
* Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
When I try to install the game in w/e way it opens up steam and then nothing happens. Any idea what could be wrong?
